metadata.title: CVE-2017-5943 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Request Tracker (RT) 4.x before 4.0.25, 4.2.x before 4.2.14, and 4.4.x before 4.4.2 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information about cross-site request forgery (CSRF) verification tokens via a crafted URL.

criterions.comment: request-tracker4 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.1-4').
